website_summaries.verdict: A dependable product that works best if you have ABS and all-wheel drive and travel under 30 mph.
pros: Suitable for sedans, trucks, and SUVs
Loose chains are rarely, if ever, a problem

customer_reviews.title: Easiest chains Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Were building our own house in a remote neighborhood the mountains south of SLC, without these chains I wouldn't have been able to access our build site for 1\2 the winter......your car literally feels unstoppable on snow and ice with these things. If you've never driven in\on snow ice with tire chains there's no way you can imagine the difference, its literally night and day. Crazy easy to get on and off once you get a system down, far superior told old school chains with the stretchy tensioners. Just make sure to hang them to dry once you remove them or they WILL start to get some surface rust
customer_reviews.author: Hikeswithdogs

customer_reviews.title: Even Pearless doesn't know the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Look like nice chains but don't fit my car. Before ordering I contacted Peerless customer service to be sure I ordered the right size. The customer service rep was totally wrong so I have to return order to Amazon for a refund minus shipping cost. The chains look great but I will go to a retail dealer to make sure I get the right size and try them on before I drive away. My tire is a General Tire AltiMax 215-55-17 on a 2015 Kia Soul.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rhyner

customer_reviews.title: this is my 2nd set in 2 years, broke first storm
customer_reviews.text: I have to deal directly with the manufacturer who requires they be sent UPS or FedEx and they are metal chains so that will be at my expense bc these are now manufactured to be pieces of poop. I used the last for 2 years and was quite happy. I cannot believe that in 1 measly storm cycle these broke on both left and right wheels. And it was a metal link that broke both places. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: L West

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: So I put it on as per the directions to check if they fit. I was sceptical about the automatic adjustments as you move the car, but lo and behold I started moving, the clicking started and after like 20 feet the chains were perfectly centered and tight. I'm upset I didn't buy these sooner. Great product easy installation, will update after the first storm see how the handled the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Mikesusa40

customer_reviews.title: Used them for the first time today and they are great
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are super clear and easy to follow and honestly installation couldn't be easier. You don't need to position these and drive over them. You just stop, straighten out the chains, look and hook the back park, hook the two front tensioners together and you're all set. I put them on, drove several feet and took a look and both had perfectly adjusted. Chain pattern is such that driving on them doesn't cause much vibration. Very pleased. Used on a 2010 Toyota Prius and there is tons of clearance. The chains stay completely over the tire and don't touch the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I love AutoTracs, but after a few low milage, low speed drives 6 links busted off one of the chains. I've contacted the seller to see if anything can be done to repair/replace the chains under warranty - will update rating if/when the issue is resolved. (The repair kit doesn't come with enough links to fix the break)
customer_reviews.author: BlackBetty

customer_reviews.title: Very easy installation, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a set of 205/65R15 tires. They are very easy to install and painless to tighten and center. However, I quickly realized that one of the links was missing on the chain (see photo with pink marker on missing link). This would cause the chain to hit and damage the wheel and wheel well. I should not need to inspect the chains beforehand; however this is unacceptable. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. I have a 03 Hyundai Elantra and that car is absolutely horrible in the snow. Even the slightest of inclines, if there is snow/ice on the ground, I am stuck. However once I put these chains on, it is like I have tracks for tires. Be it snow, ice or mud, incline or decline, these chains did what they were supposed to do. I would highly recommend them to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Used these in california mountain roads in light 1-2inch snow
customer_reviews.text: These pair of chains are quite easy to install, remove, and work fantastically in 1-2" of snow in mountain roads. I drive a regular 2WD sedan and they kept me on the roads with no issues. Would recommend just for the ease of installation/removal
customer_reviews.author: chinesefarmer

customer_reviews.title: First time a charm
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our trip to Yosemite. They were easy to put on during our test run at home. The fit pretty snug. At the ranger station when we had to put them on, the tires seemed to have expanded from the 7 hours of driving which made the chains' cable latch hard to connect--like the chains seemed too small. After about 10-15 minutes sitting in the snow my two daughters finally got them connected. We kept them on for the 3 days we were there--they held up great and felt very secure as we drove up to the ski area, to our mountain condo, etc. This was our first time driving in the snow and using chains.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D. Penland

customer_reviews.title: Can't give a good review at this time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my Ram 1500. The chains don't fit well and they don't look very strong. Have not used them on the road yet, so I can't really say if they will work well. I will do a good review after I use them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer's Snow Chain Improvement
customer_reviews.text: The idea to easily to slide the chain around and over the tire then lock the chains together. However, the tension cables come up short by 1 to 2 inches to become easier to connect the cable to the chain. Remember, the cable and chain's are freezing cold causing it harder to install. Solution would be is to lengthen the cable by 2 inches. Chains performed perfectly when driving through snow covered roads.
customer_reviews.author: Gogie

customer_reviews.title: These chains are super simple to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: These chains are super simple to put on and take off. Test fitting and practicing before you head out is the best way to properly install the chains onto your wheels. Since you dont have to re-tighten the chains, the grip is pretty consistent. I drive a 06 mustang GT on 265/40/18 tires and I dont have to worry about sliding down a slope as im braking. I dont drive in thick snow/ice since I mainly bought these to put on whenever I go snowboarding here in socal, but these gave me so much more confidence driving in chain required areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased these for a 2012 Toyota Camry we ended up having to use them only for about 10 minutes down the road chains were a bit difficult to latch on in the back part of the tire but once that part is finished everything else in regards to install is pretty easy The self adjusting feature is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing on the website is wrong, and quality is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Sizing on the Peerless and on Amazon doesn't match what the actual bag says, so odds are you'll have to return and guess yourself what the right size is. These also look and feel OK, but not nearly as nice as Konig (formerly Thule), that are now the same price. The cable connector on the Peerless is both hard to use (prone to freezing or getting stuck) and failure prone. Plastic tensioners also don't inspire confidence. If you can wait for the long delivery time, definitely go with Konig.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any of the sizing issues that some buyers have noted. On my P225s the main cable did have to be connected basically behind the tire, so the photo in the instructions was a bit misleading. I had them on for about 4 days in freezing temps driving around town with no issues. The 'treads' are chain-link with tension cables on each side of the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: We measured exactly as we should and these did not fit our Tiguan tires. Luckily the Tiguan is a badass suv anyways and we didn't end up needing them in the ice/snow in Tahoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Vanderwalker

customer_reviews.title: Best chains to get!
customer_reviews.text: These are far superior to any other types of snow chains or cables. Easy to get on and easy to get off, and they provide the same traction as other devices. We have used them several times to get in and out of Tahoe and have never had any issues. They have been extremely durable provided you do care for them.
customer_reviews.author: Xeb329

customer_reviews.title: Looks like well made chains.
customer_reviews.text: As a former long haul trucker I have dealt with many types of tire chains. These look as though they will be excellent chains for a passenger vehicle. I bought these for an upcoming 4,800 mile road trip I am taking with my wife. We will be crossing the cascades and Rockies so if I need them, they are there. Hopefully they work as advertised. If not I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best tire chain out there
customer_reviews.text: These chains are a snap to put on, it took about 10 mins to put on. Learn how to use them at home in your drive way where it should be dry and clean etc. Drove about 30miles with a lot of dry spots and they stayed adjusted the whole time. They are well worth the extra money . Ps There were a couple of guys (chain installers) standing close by and came over and said guess you wont need our help with those chains. If every one used the Auto-Trac Tire Chains they would be out of jobs) These are the guys that hang out where you have to pull over and put on the chains when needed etc.
customer_reviews.author: VonnRey

customer_reviews.title: don't fit, cheated on the return!
customer_reviews.text: No way in the world the recommended size 0155005 will EVER fit tires 255/45 R19. Glad I tried in in the driveway on a dry day. Just to make sure this was a BAD PURCHASE I only have one free return option, time wasting in Kohl's rather than a prompt drop off at a closer and far quicker UPS store which cost me $12.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Snow Chains!!! Worth Every Dime!
customer_reviews.text: These snow chains are more superb than advertised. These chains will get you through the most slippery places without a slide. Used them quite a few times and they always thrill me. No more skidding or slipping. Takes practice to put on quickly but they will definitely get you where you wanna!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peta_b

customer_reviews.title: Never struggle to put on chains ever again
customer_reviews.text: I go snowboarding pretty much every weekend once the lifts open, so I knew these were a must for my new car. But I knew I HATED the ones that you have to tighten yourself even though they are cheaper, so I found these and invested. OMG Never again will I have to struggle to put on chains when its bitterly cold and raining or snowing on my way up the mountain. I can just drive over these babies and they do all the work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to install
customer_reviews.text: The ratcheting mechanism wore out after 5 seasons. I liked the chains so much that I purchased another set in spite of them wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: tj Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Love these chains!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for multiple cars over the years. Both RWD and FWD. Chrysler Town and Country, Buick Lacrosse and BMW 323i. Easy to install and you can't be stopped no matter what the road is covered with. I live in the mountains with close to 18% grades and these never leave me stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Fournier

customer_reviews.title: These are the easiest tire chains to use at an ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the easiest tire chains to use at an affordable cost. Sure, Spiders are easier, but I don't have that kind of money. These go on quick, tighten way up. People complaining about the take-up mechanism, shoot some WD-40 in there  every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good chains, but Amazon sizing guide different from peerless website
customer_reviews.text: **as others have said, make sure you look at peerless's website since the sizing guide is different here** The model I got fits on my 2012 scion TC with ease. I have yet to drive with them, but based on me trying them out, I believe they'll work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire chains with very good traction.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Used them for the first time today on our way up to South Lake Tahoe. They were easy to install and worked very well. Total use today was about 35 miles. Will probably use them tomorrow if needed. Note: I did not exceed 30 mph. Would not recommend faster speeds over 30 mph.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: These are very easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to put on. Last year I struggled with two different sets of chains from another manufacturer. Really wanted something that would work well and be easy to install. These are the ones I had been needing. I usually can avoid kneeling in the snow and can get them both on my ford transit in less than 10 minutes. They stay on and get me up the steep Colorado hills to my house. I was nervous that the plastic tightener was going to break, but I have driven short distances with the chains on five times this year and so far all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Anne W. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: 5 min on, 3 min off.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Took us about 5 min to get them on the tires and about 3 minutes to remove them. WAYYYYY better than our old chains. They didn't flop around at all because of the self tightening mechanism. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Missa

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these a few years ago and really liked the product since it was easy to install the snow chains (really easy!!!) After switching cars / tire size I bought 2 more pair to fit each vehicle with these. No need to stop and adjust/tighten the chain - the Auto-Trac tighteners do it automatically. Love the product and recommend to anyone looking for tire chains!
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 45-year-old female and my son and I were able to put these on in about five minutes! It could not have been any easier. They centered, and tight! I felt completely secure while driving through snow and ice!
customer_reviews.author: robin_1216

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased there this year and tried them out. Super easy to install and remove. Love them. Don't know if I'll get to use them or not but the piece of mind of having them in the trunk is great! My wife watched me install them and saw how easy it was and now wants a set for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I bought these after seeing how well they did with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after seeing how well they did with ease on a friends car, unfortunetly when I put in my tire size it has my tire listed on the official website but it gives you the wrong part number. The chains physical tire list didn’t go much bigger than a 16 and my tires are 17’s but per the peerless website it was the “correct part number” TLDR: peerless doesn’t have the correct part numbers for some of the tires even when using the part number or the tire size for search function.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Douglas Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about these tire chains. They work, and they work great. I live at the top of a steep hill, in the winter I cannot get up without them. It takes a couple of minutes to install and they tighten themselves as I drive. I can attempt to climb the hill, get stopped at the steepest part, put it in first gear set the parking break, with snow piled around put the on in less than 5 minutes. then on that steep hill start to drive up without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy install. worked great
customer_reviews.text: These chains were perfect, I had ordered them and they arrived the day of my trip to the mountains. Thank goodness they came in because it started to snow on my way up. Pulled into a gas station and only took me about 15 mins tops to put both on and I had never used any type of chains/cables ecer. Would definitely recommend these just for the simplicity of install.
customer_reviews.author: steven flores

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I can only write about putting these chains on because I have not had to use them in a real situation yet. They are very easy to put on. They come with a plastic instruction sheet that can be used to kneel on when you are applying them. I like the color coded pieces, it makes the instructions much easier to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Really liked the tightening mechanism, much easier to use than my last set of chains.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan V M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: They include a big and waterproof installation manual. They also include some spare links in case they break. I recommend that you learn how to install them before it snows.
customer_reviews.author: Dariela

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: Comes with floor mat with instructions Will only get to try it out next week
customer_reviews.author: a_b_c

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The sizing on these were very inaccurate- then when I returned them- the gave me a $16.00 refund of the $40.00 I spent on them. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Krity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent traction
customer_reviews.text: I now have my second pair of Auto-Trac tire chains. The rear of my vehicle wanted to walk around on me going down hills and around bends with chains on the front only. I got a second set for the rear tires and it is almost like driving on a dry road. I can put myself forward against the seat belt when braking. I cannot believe the amount of control I have of my vehicle with 2 sets on. Awesome. Best purchase yet.
customer_reviews.author: Acutely Aware

customer_reviews.title: EZ tire chain install
customer_reviews.text: These chains were perfect for our 2015 Nissan Rogue. Have not actually had them installed and used in the snow yet. But when I practiced installing them they were very easy to install which will be ideal when I am trying to install them in the snow. Instructions to install chains were very easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Real chains, perfect for long term use
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved to the states from NZ and Aus, where chain use is frequent as snow tires aren’t common. These are great chains, unlike other thinner options that seem to be the rage these days, these are real, durable chains and are very easy to install. I used these when stuck on the ice in Carson pass in a 4wd and got them on in a jiffy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alastair Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, keep me on the road!
customer_reviews.text: These chains are so easy to put on, which is great in the cold and snow! They're a little trickier to take off but only because I always end up driving over the chains so I have to inch forward till I get off them, but that's not the chains' fault! I've driven on them in 6inch snow and most likely ice (hard to tell at night) and have never had any traction problems!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Frey

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Im able to put them on and take them off easily and quickly when they are needed. I drive far each day in the mountains and weather changes quickly area to area. These are life changing. The sense of security alone is priceless
customer_reviews.author: zoe connell

customer_reviews.title: Web site size chart is WRONG...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 0155005 Auto-Trac because the website said they would fit my 225/65-R17 tires. It's wrong these are much to small...
customer_reviews.author: B. D.

customer_reviews.title: To loud but doing the work
customer_reviews.text: Doing the work but it knocks so loud so you can't stand it when you reach more then 15 miles per hour. The problem with this plastic connectors that hit the disks with every spin... Maybe it is wrong fit, but previous size was to small for our weals. We are using this chains on Nissan Rogue S
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the correct size but when I tried to install them. They felt very loose. Even when they were adjusted, by moving the car forward. Can someone please let me know if this is how these are suppose to be?
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use these in actual snow but very easy to put on inside the garage in perfect conditions like the auto adjust unfortunately I sold the car in the cables wen't with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: The Peerless chains are very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The Peerless chains are very easy to install. But, my cabin has a slight short hill. I broke the chains twice. I do like the fact they give you extra links. After the third time breaking the chains they were unrepairable. I had to take someone else's car to buy new heavy duty chains. Got out with no problem. Peerless chains would probably be fine on flat roads with a light dusting of snow. BTW, I'm in Southern California. Not exactly know for heavy snowfall here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick Install
customer_reviews.text: WOW, finally and snow chain that super quick and easy to install works as stated.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Link was defective
customer_reviews.text: Links came defective on one of the set of chains so it would not wrap around the tire entirely.
customer_reviews.author: hongwei wang

customer_reviews.title: They Install Easily and Fit Snugly...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son-in-law and haven't heard any complaints to date. They install easily and fit snugly on the drive tires.
customer_reviews.author: Freestyle

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Have NEVER reviewed anything here. But these deserve it. With the winter we are having here in northern NH I got a set of these. They have bailed me out 4 times. Tricky first time getting them on so practice on a "good" day. I can get them on in less than 5 min per wheel. Turns my car into a tank. NOT for going on a long drive.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I went on two family trips to the mountains with these chains and they worked excellent. Putting them on the first time took a little time due to you need to figure out the correct direction of the locks. After that it was very easy and fast compared to conventional chains. I loved the self adjusting. They are very reliable and excellent for traction.
customer_reviews.author: Vegaslee

customer_reviews.title: Size according to chart is not right.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 0154505 according to chart but on the tag it doesn't say my size 235/40/19. Tried put on but the gap is huge and impossible to connect the 2nd hook. Have another set for other vehicle and installation is ok. Please check your chart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chains
customer_reviews.text: Best Chains for my Subaru WRX, They go on fairly easy, auto tighten and grip well. I bought 2 sets to put on all 4 tires and it was well worth the investment. They do need to be cared for. They will rust if they aren't oiled. I would probably only keep these for 2 to 3 seasons though, but that's my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: S. Macnab

customer_reviews.title: look long lasting and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These chains allow you to put them on your car without ever touching the ground, and they self adjust on top of that.... look long lasting and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Civic LX, worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I read my Civic manual and purchased this, which was recommended for my tire type. 1 sheet of instructions, shown through pcitures (always easier). Worked perfectly through heavy snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer size guide is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Found impossible to install as the chains recommended on their web site do not begin to fit. Further, the tag included or attached to the package of the chains has a list of the tire sizes the chains are intended for and that list does not include my size.
customer_reviews.author: George F. Laun

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my car and put me in harm's way.
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to get them put on when I needed them and then they ripped apart my breakline.
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Oh so Easy
customer_reviews.text: So very easy to install and there is no way we will get stuck in the snow. They have a meen grip.
customer_reviews.author: Murf the Surf

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a rural mail man, even just one of these on the box side back tire of our crappy LLV's and its like ice and snow isn't even there, it's the easy on and off and the self tightening that make these the best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: one of the lock is facing the wrong direction. ...
customer_reviews.text: one of the lock is facing the wrong direction. makes it hard for me to remove(especially when it is freezing outside and you cant wear a glove because it is hard to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chains!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are easy to put on and take off! Just bought them and tried them out, and it was a snap. Worked great during the ice storm here in Dallas, and kept tight as promised. I feel more confident with these - with the previous chains I always stopped and tightened the chains after a few minutes, as they usually loosened.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Heuchert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: made sure I got the right ones from website .. in the trunk just in case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and Off!
customer_reviews.text: These chains are very easy to put on, which was a requirement as this is for my wife's van. The chains are quite on the road with good traction. The only suggestion I give my wife is after driving a little while to pull over and equalize the ratchets to ensure the chains are centerd.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chains
customer_reviews.text: These Chains install and remove very easily. I have had to put them on in sub-zero temps and 3-6 inch deep snow and it takes only a few minutes. Once installed, they tighten as you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Moese

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: These cable chains came with great instructions, making mounting a very simple task. Works great on snow covered ice, had no trouble in getting out of my up-hill driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great chains
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Easy to install and remove. Work well in the snow
customer_reviews.author: C.McCartney

customer_reviews.title: He was thankful
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my husband to install for the first time while snowing. He thanked me for buying such high quality snow chains rather than the cables.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE 'EM!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand and style for my truck. They worked so well and were so easy to apply/remove that I bought another set for a friend to go on their Toyota Prius. Now I don't have to pick him up for work and take him home in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: KayakingKampingKevinTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit. The manufacturer's site suggested that this ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit. The manufacturer's site suggested that this would be compatible with my tires. The chains didn't fit and the tags listing compatible sizes on the chains don't include my tire size.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: The 0155005 model fits the factory wheels on both my Jeep Patriot Sport and Mercury Grand Marquis. I have only had to use the chains once so far, worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: hello there

customer_reviews.title: Great chains!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best tire chains money can buy. They work great, go on easy, and never come off from being loose.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa & Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great snow tire chains
customer_reviews.text: These are some awesome snow chains. Great design for those who dont' want to work in the snow too long. Very easy for my wife to do. Fit my 2006 Hyundai Sonata like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Adams

customer_reviews.title: While no tire chain is perfect, these seem to be the closest I've found
customer_reviews.text: While no tire chain is perfect, these seem to be the closest I've found. No damage to a front wheel drive car or rim from using these
customer_reviews.author: Jmutiger

customer_reviews.title: Mt rainier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased when it was $60. I used this chains today at Mt Rainier. They can be easily installed. But when you get off them , you need to align the chains as you installed them. The green hook should be on the top side of tire and red hook be on the bottom side of tire. This easily make you unhook the behind of your tire.
customer_reviews.author: DOSUNG SOHN

customer_reviews.title: Will Save Your Behind
customer_reviews.text: Easiest to fit tire chains I have found. These got my rear wheel drive car over a frozen mountain pass in a Colorado Winter Storm safely and with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... never used chains before I had these and I love them! So easy to put on and take ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never used chains before I had these and I love them! So easy to put on and take off and they get the job done great
customer_reviews.author: Emily Maass

customer_reviews.title: Makes getting home in a storm easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand of chains on my other car. They got me home in a 2 (front) wheel 4 cylinder car when 4x4 trucks were getting stuck so I bought this set for my second car. This size came in a soft case, I prefer the hard case that comes with larger (tire) size sets.
customer_reviews.author: ruthofutah

customer_reviews.title: Much better than old fashioned chains.
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to put on than the old fashioned chains. These went on fairly easily. Definitely appreciated the mat to kneel on.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: 0154505 is too small for Honda Accord 2016 (size 215/55R-17) ...
customer_reviews.text: 0154505 is too small for Honda Accord 2016 (size 215/55R-17). And don't believe the Amazon's chart. 0154005 is smaller than 0154505.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit to have for an emergency
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a well constructed product. I bought it to have in case of an emergency so I haven't actually used the chains. They come in a carrying case which is flat and doesn't take up much room at all. I have a Subaru AWD so I didn't want to spend a lot of money on snow tires. These chains will be great if I find myself on an icy road or get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: james lavelle

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well in my Honda Civic 2016 LX
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well in my Honda Civic 2016 LX . I would recommend them as they are the ones recommended by Honda for this car.
customer_reviews.author: Nestorcup

customer_reviews.title: dont fit
customer_reviews.text: The chains do not fit 215 70r 15 tires like we were led to believe. The bottom cable is about 2inches short
customer_reviews.author: Larry Butler

customer_reviews.title: Work great, fit great
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as dscribed. Fit my wife's 2016 Town & Country without issue. Very happy and would reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to put on...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items I've ever spent $$$ on!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J's Books

customer_reviews.title: There is a trick to proper install.... (see review)
customer_reviews.text: What I learned (and had to write in the instruction sheet, so I remember) from installing them on a nice, warm day is: Passenger side: Route the red end from the rear to the front. Driver side: Route the red end from the front to rear This is so that the locking module faces the correct orientation. This is with a 2016 VW Tiguan SE 4Motion with the factory 16" steel wheels with 215/65r16 Nitto SN-2 winter tires. Hopefully, I will never have to use them
customer_reviews.author: AngryAsianMan

customer_reviews.title: Very good tire changed I use them when I was on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good tire changed I use them when I was on my trip to the Pacific Northwest when I was up on Mount Hood in Oregon two weeks ago very easy to install worked great very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried them in snow or tried to put them on in snow, but just for a test run, they are easier to install than other types.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: the fit was fine and I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the first chain I have that fit my truck tires. There was no trouble installing this with out moving the truck an inch. WQith help from Auto Alley, the fit was fine and I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Philip G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. Well made. Durable. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Fit well and easy to install. I cannot speak to durability as I have only used one time.
customer_reviews.author: karaage

customer_reviews.title: Chains worked great
customer_reviews.text: Just the right chain for my Prius V. They went on and off very easily (watch the training video first!), and drove pretty smoothly. I love the self tightening feature. I would recommend based on my one use of these. I don't know how long they might last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick when others where spinning out. Easy to put on and take off. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2004 Honda Accord LX with 205/60/15 Tires
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for SnowShoe WV. Glad I practice putting them on and off before I needed them. Still had some issues with snow everywhere. Bring form fitting gloves that are waterproof and not made of wool. Wool kept getting stuck to the cold chains.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: good chains
customer_reviews.text: got the chains for a short skiing trip and they worked fine they are easy to install and worked fine the two times I needed them for the price they where a good buy
customer_reviews.author: ksl

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these things, worth every cent, would buy again and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Trippers

product_meta.title: Peerless 0153005 Auto-Trac Tire Traction Chain - Set of 2
product_meta.description: Size:Series 1500 - 153005Auto‑Trac can be installed without moving (or jacking up) the vehicle! The patented, ratcheting tightening system automatically tightens the chain while driving. Just connect the inside cable, attach the two outside selftighteners and drive! No additional chain tensioners are necessary or recommended. Auto‑Trac will meet Class “S” clearance requirements on SUVs and pickup trucks, as well as normal passenger cars (matching the capabilities of most of our “Z” cable products). This is possible because of a highly effective, patented tensioning system. Auto‑Trac cross member links are made of manganese alloy steel, allowing them to be shorter, narrower and lighter than conventional cross members. This reduces “fly‑off” during operation and provides more gripping points. The low‑mass “D” cross section of the links also contributes to longer wear because the impact of the cross members on the road surface is reduced and the surface area contacting the road is increased.
feature_bullets: Worry-free self-tightening ratchets provide automatic tightening and centering
Easy installation and removal in minutes
Do not exceed 30 MPH with these chains on
Diamond pattern cross chain provides a smoother ride and superior traction
Worry-free self-tightening ratchets provide automatic tightening and centering
Easy installation and removal in minutes
Eliminates loose chains and retightening stops
Diamond pattern cross chain provides a smoother ride and superior traction
